response.original_title: In This World, I Am King
response.overview: An aging artist wrestles with the weight of his legacy and the fractured identities he’s created to survive. As he confronts his art, his past, and the trauma he's long ignored, a deeper question emerges: What does it truly mean to be an artist? From the small town of Pauls Valley, OK — where he’s a local legend — he grapples with being both revered and isolated. There, he is king, but at what cost?
response.title: In This World, I Am King

results.name: IN THIS WORLD, I AM KING TRAILER
